title: The Tale of little pig Robinson
brief_description: Timothy Spall, Dawn French and Jennifer Saunders star in this adaptation of the classic Beatrix Potter story. Little pig Robinson is sent to market by his two maiden Aunts Dorcas and Porcas. On the way, he is “pignapped” and taken to sea where his adventures really begin. The moral is “Don’t talk to strangers” and in the end, good triumphs over evil.
